scripts.test:integration: polymer build # test that psk builds without error with the CLI
scripts.publish: npm run publish:build && npm run publish:git
scripts.publish:build: polymer build && rm -rf gh-pages/ && cp -r build/es5-bundled/ gh-pages/ && cp LICENSE gh-pages/LICENSE
scripts.publish:git: git add gh-pages && git commit -m "Publishing gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix gh-pages origin gh-pages
